questions.question: What is overfitting in machine learning?

options.A: When a model performs perfectly on all datasets
options.B: When a model learns the training data too well, including noise and outliers
options.C: When a model is too simple
options.D: When a model runs too fast

questions.question: What is the role of activation functions in neural networks?
